entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Hazy this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
